module.name: Polycom Phones
module.description: Adds configurations, options and GUI for Polycom phones
module.changelog: *2.11.0.15* Adds options to change phone provisioning settings and enhance security *2.11.0.14* Fixed compatibility issue with FreePBX 13 *2.11.0.13* Adds device password options, support for new Polycom MACs, and compatibility for FreePBX 13 *2.11.0.12* Adds loud ringer option and enables n-way conference *2.11.0.11* Adds NTP options and phone display update on adhoc login *2.11.0.10* Adds integration with phone features module *2.11.0.9* Fixed a bug introduced with flexible line assignment *2.11.0.8* Adds flexible line key assignment *2.11.0.7* Adds codec priority options to network settings *2.11.0.6* Adds additional attendant options and option subheadings *2.11.0.5* Adds support for phone overrides, additional options and help popups *2.11.0.4* Adds authentication options to network settings *2.11.0.3* Adds network settings and additional phone options *2.11.0.2* Adds power saving settings and additional help popups *2.11.0.1* Adds alert info, corporate settings and additional phone options *2.11.0.0* Initial release for UC software
